subject: Tests (Drug Use)
Doping (Sports)
Football
Human Growth Hormone
lead_paragraph: In an article in Saturday’s editions of The New York Times, the testing plan for H.G.H. was inaccurately described as requiring only one test per year.
snippet: In an article in Saturday’s editions of The New York Times, the testing plan for H.G.H. was inaccurately described as requiring only one test per year.
